title: OAuth20.Server.Host
description: Hosted OAuth 2.0 Authorization Server for ASP.NET Core, featuring built-in OAuth 2.0 endpoints, Blazor-based Admin Panel and Personal Account UI, and support for various deployment options including Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, and Windows Service/IIS. Leverages core libraries from DotNetExtensions.OAuth20.
